attributes.action: STOP EDL (English Defence League) Organizing Demonstrations.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop EDL (English Defence League), comprising of former members of the BNP, the National Front and other fascist organisations, whom are promoting crime and anti-social behaviour in our communities.

Currently, we are having to pick up the bill for the damage caused by the EDL (English Defence League) as tax payers and insurers in the United Kingdom. This group of terrorists have damaged our personal properties, belongings and communities.

I appeal to every person of every race, of every faith within the United Kingdom to help get the EDL off our streets immediately. We cannot live our lives in constant fear of our family and friends being attacked by the EDL (English Defence League).

It is time to take a stand against the EDL (English Defence League) as citizens of United Kingdom. It is time to banish terrorism from our streets. It is time for our views and opinions to be heard in rebuilding our communities and our nation.
